attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: false-value
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: true-value
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-text
attrs.desc: Switch whether to display the text in the content.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: mini
attrs.desc: Sets whether to display in mini mode. In mini mode, the content of the slot is not displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.
